类的使用
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Query

  • 使用Query的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client
    Provides HBase Client Table of Contents Overview Example API Usage Overview To administer HBase, create and drop tables, list and alter tables, use Admin.
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.security.access  

    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client中Query的使用

      org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client中Query的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  Get
      Used to perform Get operations on a single row.
      class  Scan
      Used to perform Scan operations.
      返回Query的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Query Query.setACL(Map<String,Permission> perms) 
      Query Query.setACL(String user, Permission perms) 
      Query Query.setAuthorizations(Authorizations authorizations)
      Sets the authorizations to be used by this Query
      Query Query.setColumnFamilyTimeRange(byte[] cf, long minStamp, long maxStamp)
      Get versions of columns only within the specified timestamp range, [minStamp, maxStamp) on a per CF bases.
      Query Query.setConsistency(Consistency consistency)
      Sets the consistency level for this operation
      Query Query.setFilter(Filter filter)
      Apply the specified server-side filter when performing the Query.
      Query Query.setIsolationLevel(IsolationLevel level)
      Set the isolation level for this query.
      Query Query.setLoadColumnFamiliesOnDemand(boolean value)
      Set the value indicating whether loading CFs on demand should be allowed (cluster default is false).
      Query Query.setReplicaId(int Id)
      Specify region replica id where Query will fetch data from.

    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver中Query的使用

      org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver中Query的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  InternalScan
      Special scanner, currently used for increment operations to allow additional server-side arguments for Scan operations.
